title: Disclosure Reveals New Song 'Magnets' Featuring Lorde
content: By Amanda Wicks Electronic-duo Disclosure revealed another track off their upcoming studio album Carcaral today on Beats 1 Radio, according to Spin. This one, titled “Magnets,” features Lorde. With building synths, a hypnotic rhythm and Lorde’s breathy vocals, the song has Top 40 potential written all over it. Related: Disclosure and Sam Smith Cover Drake Previous track releases off their upcoming album feature Sam Smith on “Omen.” Smith worked with Disclosure on 2012’s single “Latch” from their debut album Settle, and recently performed with the brothers on BBC’s Radio 1’s Live Lounge with a killer cover of Drake’s “Hotline Bling.” Earlier this summer, the New Zealand songstress tweeted a photo with brothers Howard and Guy Lawrence. The three got milkshakes together and were working on music. Listen below. Carcaral drops this Friday, September 25th.
